name: Shrooms (itch) (Sugghy)
description:
Shrooms is a small game made for B3agz game jam. Your garden is overrun by shrooms, you have to match their color before its too late

Buttons : - arrow keys to move cursor

                      - x to confirm

How to play

Match shrooms of the same color to get point and extend your time. To connect shrooms just place your cursor on an empty space that is up,down or to the side of at least 2 shrooms of the same color.
